properties.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 1 at 8:11AM AKST until February 3 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow occurring. Plan on difficult
travel conditions. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times.
Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches, with localized
amounts up to 4 inches, are expected.

* WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast.

* WHEN...Until noon Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 60 mph will cause
areas of blowing and drifting snow. Cold wind chills as low as
50 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes
to exposed skin.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Storm Warning for snow and blowing snow means severe
winter weather conditions are occurring. This will make travel
very difficult or impossible.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST MONDAY
